examples: The gymnast effortlessly bent her body into a graceful arch during her routine.
They're graceful.
- It was so graceful too.
We know whales as graceful giants.
That was not as graceful as I was hoping for.
words.defineEn: moving in a pleasing and attractive way, or having an appealing shape
words.defineVi: di chuyển một cách dễ chịu và hấp dẫn, hoặc có một hình dạng hấp dẫn

examples: The interneurons in the spinal cord help to relay signals from sensory neurons to motor neurons, allowing for coordinated movements.
Coordinated action worked!
Two days before the boycotts, the U.S. and Europe launched coordinated sanctions.
This is a coordinated attack against the YouTube algorithm, complete with countermeasures.
In a heart, there’s no coordinated contraction, no lub-dub, no blood moving through the body.
words.defineEn: being capable of using a set of muscles to perform a single task
words.defineVi: có khả năng sử dụng một tập hợp các cơ để thực hiện một nhiệm vụ duy nhất

examples: But he is obviously a rather deft politician, who continues to do and say and tweet things because he believes that that’s a way to convey messages that he wants conveyed to the American people.
words.defineEn: having quick and skillful movements
words.defineVi: có những chuyển động nhanh nhẹn và khéo léo

examples: And that means you could get ketchup out of the bottle in two ways: either give it a series of long, slow languid shakes making sure you don't ever stop applying force, or you could hit the bottle once very, very hard.
words.defineEn: moving in a slow, effortless, and attractive manner
words.defineVi: di chuyển một cách chậm rãi, dễ dàng và hấp dẫn

words.defineEn: moving fast and with grace
words.defineVi: di chuyển nhanh và duyên dáng

examples: He's younger, more lithe, and a little smarter.
And they're in the cat family, Felidae, whose members have lithe bodies and roundish heads and, except for cheetahs, retractable claws.
words.defineEn: being flexible and moving in an attractive way
words.defineVi: linh hoạt và di chuyển một cách hấp dẫn

words.defineEn: (of a person) moving in a relaxed way, and not stiff
words.defineVi: (của một người) di chuyển một cách thoải mái, và không cứng nhắc

examples: Iberian caravels were nimble and they could be loaded with cannons.
It was a nimble hunter of fish and squid.
The Iranians are quite nimble in contemplating and in carrying out retaliations to attacks like this.
The Scooper is so nimble because of its flight-control surfaces, or aerodynamic devices that pilots use to adjust and control the aircraft.
Georgie is 77 years old and he's nimble as a cat.
words.defineEn: moving fast with ease and agility
words.defineVi: di chuyển nhanh một cách dễ dàng và nhanh nhẹn

examples: It's very supple.
Its supple vines wind around other plants or structures, like this arbor.
This simple cat and cow movement helps the spine stay more supple.
The leather itself should feel very supple, very luxurious.
What is-- It was so soft and supple.
words.defineEn: flexible, pliant, and able to move with ease and grace
words.defineVi: linh hoạt, mềm dẻo và có thể di chuyển dễ dàng và duyên dáng

examples: It's like getting a lap dance from a more ungainly Elvis Costello.
And this group of long-necked, dome-headed chalicotheres came to be known by the ungainly name of Shizerotheriinae.
words.defineEn: moving in a way that is awkward and not smooth
words.defineVi: di chuyển một cách vụng về và không suôn sẻ

examples: Destin's probably just an uncoordinated engineer and can't do it.
But because he has ataxia, he does have the risk of falling over things and being very uncoordinated to the point where he can hurt himself.
He’s currently living alone because he was causing a lot of stress on the females, just because he’s young and uncoordinated and kind of pushy.
words.defineEn: incapable of moving one's muscles together with ease
words.defineVi: không thể cử động các cơ một cách dễ dàng

examples: Lumbering increased Minty’s physical strength and put her in touch with free black sailors who shipped the wood to the North.
words.defineEn: moving slowly or in an awkward way because of being heavy
words.defineVi: di chuyển chậm hoặc một cách khó xử vì nặng nề

words.defineEn: moving in a way that is not attractive or smooth
words.defineVi: di chuyển theo cách không hấp dẫn hoặc trơn tru

examples: A clumsy chef accidentally spills ingredients, knocks over pots, and slips on the floor, creating a hilarious comedy of errors in the kitchen.
I'm both clumsy and broke, so I decided not to go in.
And that this clumsy process could not be possible for the majestic beauty of our world.
Maybe it’s because porcupines are actually pretty clumsy.
They may have even begun our first clumsy attempts at fire, which is vital for cooking meat and vegetables, opening up opportunities for more energy and even more brain growth.
words.defineEn: doing things or moving in a way that lacks control and care, usually causing accidents
words.defineVi: làm mọi việc hoặc di chuyển theo cách thiếu kiểm soát và cẩn thận, thường gây ra tai nạn

examples: It's going to be awkward, to say the least.
This is awkward.
This is awkward.
that was awkward.
This is awkward.
words.defineEn: moving uncomfortably in a way that lacks grace and confidence
words.defineVi: di chuyển không thoải mái theo cách thiếu duyên dáng và tự tin

examples: Its skin feels really smooth.
When we were little and were getting on Grandpa's last nerve, she smoothed his ruffled feathers.
Adding crème fraîche to mashed potatoes gives them a silky smooth texture and a subtle tang.
We'll be in smooth waters if we can secure a new loan extension from the bank.
She used a brush to smooth out the knots in her hair.
words.defineEn: without any sudden changes, jerks, or bumps; steady and continuous
words.defineVi: không có bất kỳ thay đổi đột ngột, giật hoặc va chạm nào; ổn định và liên tục

examples: The dancers performed a mesmerizing abstract routine, blending fluid movements with unexpected angles and shapes.
Or maybe their bodies pump fluid into and out of them.
Its motion pushes the fluid within the long chambers of the cochlea.
We're putting fluids?
Fluid dynamics are awesome.
words.defineEn: having the ability to flow or move smoothly and easily without interruption or obstruction
words.defineVi: có khả năng chảy hoặc di chuyển trơn tru và dễ dàng mà không bị gián đoạn hoặc tắc nghẽn

words.defineEn: describing a graceful and refined movement, posture or gesture that is similar to the movements performed in ballet dance
words.defineVi: mô tả một chuyển động duyên dáng và tinh tế, tư thế hoặc cử chỉ tương tự như các chuyển động được thực hiện trong múa ba lê

examples: The wooden picnic table in the park was a perfect spot for lunch.
With a creak, the old wooden window finally opened, allowing fresh air to circulate.
I love the sound of my boots clicking on the wooden floor.
My father cleaned and polished the wooden furniture to keep it looking nice.
Red wooden horses run through the blood of the people in new Nusnäs, Sweden.
words.defineEn: describing something that is stiff, rigid, or lacking in fluidity, often used to describe movements or expressions of a person or their body
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó cứng nhắc, cứng nhắc hoặc thiếu tính trôi chảy, thường được sử dụng để mô tả các chuyển động hoặc biểu cảm của một người hoặc cơ thể của họ

words.defineEn: behaving or moving in an awkward or ungraceful manner, particularly due to being tall
words.defineVi: cư xử hoặc di chuyển một cách vụng về hoặc vô duyên, đặc biệt là do cao
